options.label: Where can I some Asian style food the North Terminal after security?

attributes.ANSWER_TEXT: We have Wagamama's or Yo! Sushi. Both offer delicious oriental food at great prices!

options.label: Where can I some Asian style food the South Terminal after security?

attributes.ANSWER_TEXT: In that case I would try Wagamama's. Whether eating in or taking out all dishes are cooked fresh and served within 15 minutes of ordering. Open from 4:30am they serve traditional dishes such as a full English breakfast, granola and porridge. Or, if youâ€™re feeling adventurous try the okonomiyaki, a Japanese-style omelette.
